scenes.text: Mina smiles and shares warm tea with her friends. They laugh and feel safe.
The monster slashes bone and blood floods the hall. Everyone screams in terror.
He whispers love and kisses her gently beneath bright lanterns.
His memory fractures into paranoia and obsession; the void in his mind grows.
They joke about the broken door and chuckle while cleaning together.
The captain orders the attack and the battle leaves wounded bodies.
